page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE(continued)
page.content: We play a{game}of cricket with my two younger brothers and later we decide to go for a walk in the woods.There we make a den with some sticks and ferns, playing Cops and Robbers in it.By this time Mum shouts that it is tea-time.My friend's mother comes to collect him. My favourite T.V. programme The A Team is about to begin so I sit down in the armchair to watch it.There is a new and exciting story every week.About 8 o'clock I go for my bath and mum makes me a nice hot cup of Ovaltine before I go to bed. While I am sipping my bed-time drink I think about the enjoyable day I have just had.
